name: Snake (itch) (Adam Blinkinsop)
description:
Press Z to start (or continue after death), arrow keys to change direction.

Gather the fruit to get longer, and don't run into yourself.

Available on the PICO-8 forums at https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=42546

High Scores -- I've had 28,451 reported to me; post below if you get higher!

EDIT: Post score update, expect closer to 300 and 400. :-D
